timeline.message: Use both gene1 and gene2 for calculating structural variants counts
Use both gene1 and gene2 for calculating structural variants counts
Use both gene1 and gene2 for calculating structural variants counts

timeline.bodyText: Where is this SUMMARY coming from? Why isn't this a constant?
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

replies.bodyText: SUMMARY constant is present in web layer. moving it to service layer introduces lot of changes. better to fix it in another pr
replies.author: kalletlak

timeline.bodyText: So what was molecularAlterationFilterType doing here? It looks like it was doing absolutely nothing - is that correct?
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

replies.bodyText: It was useful before when both mutation and fusion/SV data requests are handled together. I forgot to clean it up once I introduced new service for fetching/filtering fusion/SV data
replies.author: kalletlak

timeline.bodyText: We should probably document these changes with a unit test or two.
timeline.author: Luke-Sikina

replies.bodyText: True, but all this logic is gonna go away once the data is fixed. Not sure it its worth writing tests
replies.author: kalletlak
